function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"SMEs being severely affected by the pandemic","Impact":"Loss of business, financial instability, and potential closures","Mitigation":"Implementing agile practices, crisis management planning, and diversifying revenue streams","Technologies":"Agile project management tools, crisis management software, and digital transformation solutions","People":"Small and medium-sized business owners, employees, and stakeholders","Owner":"Small and medium-sized business owners and management"},{"Description":"Lack of agility in decision-making processes","Impact":"Inability to react quickly to changing conditions, leading to missed opportunities and increased risk exposure","Mitigation":"Streamlining decision-making processes, implementing agile frameworks, and fostering a culture of adaptability","Technologies":"Agile decision-making software, workflow automation tools, and real-time data analytics platforms","People":"Management teams, decision-makers, and strategic planners","Owner":"Management teams and decision-makers"},{"Description":"Relying on examples from large companies for agility implications in strategic decision-making","Impact":"Inadequate understanding of agility in the context of SMEs, leading to inappropriate strategies and poor decision-making","Mitigation":"Conducting case studies of agile SMEs, seeking expertise from SME agility consultants, and adapting agile principles to SME context","Technologies":"Data analytics for case studies, collaboration platforms for expertise sharing, and agile planning tools","People":"Strategic planners, researchers, and SME consultants","Owner":"Strategic planners and researchers"}]}
